name: IntravenousChemotherapy
title: Intravenous Chemotherapy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set is intended to capture the procedure of administering IV chemotherapy.),(Data Element Scope: Includes that the procedure of  administering IV chemotherapy is performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only IV chemotherapy is included.),(Exclusion Criteria: All other types and routes of chemotherapy are excluded.)

concept.display: Infusion of chemotherapy into a vein using push technique
Infusion of different chemotherapy drug or substance into a vein
Infusion of chemotherapy into a vein up to 1 hour
Infusion of chemotherapy into a vein
Prolonged chemotherapy infusion into a vein by portable or implanted pump more than 8 hours
Infusion of different chemotherapy drug or substance into a vein up to 1 hour

contains.display: Administration of chemotherapy into vein using push technique
Administration of additional new drug or substance into vein using push technique
Administration of chemotherapy into vein, 1 hour or less
Administration of chemotherapy into vein, each additional hour
Administration of prolonged chemotherapy into vein
Administration of additional new drug or substance into vein, 1 hour or less
